Sentencas: Ceramic proton conductive electrolytes are promising materials for reducing the operating temperatures of solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: It is desirable to achieve such a target because, as a result, durability, cost of materials, electrochemical reactions and flexibility of its use can be significantly enhanced.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: A medium-entropy perovskite with the stoichiometric formula Ba0.5Sr0.5Zr0.5Zn0.5O3 was studied in the present work using limited amounts of critical raw materials.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: According to the performed analysis, it is possible to achieve complete phase purity at 1300 degrees C. Based on dilatometric measurements, the material can undergo significant densification starting at 1200 degrees C; at about 1550 degrees C the produced perovskite melts and degrades simultaneously.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: One of the most effective characteristics of the pure phase is its ability to absorb moisture and the excellent stability to redox mechanism.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: This material's characteristic was confirmed by a series of thermochemical procedures and XRD analyses.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: As a result of electrochemical measurements carried out on 93% dense pellet consolidated at 1350 degrees C, the material has a much better conductivity and activation energy than BZY.
Titulo: Innovative low-critical raw materials and medium-entropy perovskite for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrochemical cells
